mapper.sql: id, customer_name, id_number, grid_code, phone_number, begin_at, end_at, interest_rate, rental, comment, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select:
select* from customer_credit_detail where id_number=#{idNumber}
and id != #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select * from customer_credit_detail where 1=1
and customer_name like CONCAT('%',#{customerName},'%')
and grid_code like CONCAT('%',#{gridCode},'%')
and id_number like CONCAT('%',#{idNumber},'%')

mapper.update:
update customer_credit_detail
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grid_code = #{gridCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
begin_at = #{beginAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rental = #{rental,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer_credit_detail set customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grid_code = #{gridCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, begin_at = #{beginAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rental = #{rental,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
